summary: Completed frontend testing of Individual Widget Resizing (P1) feature in Report Builder. All 6 test cases passed (100%). Report Builder at /report-builder shows width badges, width dropdown selectors, and drag handles for section resizing.

frontend: Report Builder page loads correctly at /report-builder with data-testid='report-builder-page'
Width badges visible on all 7 sections showing percentage (100%, 50%, etc.) with data-testid='width-badge-{index}'
Width dropdown selectors work correctly with data-testid='resize-width-{index}'
Drag handles appear only on sections with width < 100% (4 handles for 4 sections at 50%)
Sections can be resized using dropdown with all options: 25%, 50%, 75%, 100%
Tips text correctly mentions: 'Drag the edge handle to resize sections â€¢ Use the width dropdown for precise control (25%, 50%, 75%, 100%)'
Width badge updates dynamically when dropdown value changes
Drag handle disappears when section width changed to 100%

critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warning in ReportSection.jsx line 100: useCallback missing dependencies 'handleDragEnd' and 'handleDragMove' - minor, not affecting functionality
WIDTH_OPTIONS constant properly defines all resize options (25, 50, 75, 100)
Drag handle visibility logic correct: only shows when section.width !== 100
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Individual Widget Resizing (P1) feature fully functional in Report Builder. Key test IDs: report-builder-page, width-badge-{index}, resize-width-{index}, drag-handle-{index}, report-section-{index}. Login required (test@dataviz.com / test123), navigate via Export sidebar menu > Report Builder.

components_verified: Width badges showing percentage (100%, 50%) on section headers
Drag handles on right edge of sections with width < 100%
Tips text mentioning drag resize and dropdown controls
